Text: has anyone else had trouble with "corrupt file" message for first book?  I am also missing the first four chapters of The Girl Who Played With Fire??  Anyone else?

Thank you so much for posting this -- what a great read!

I'm not missing any chapters and had no trouble with the files, which I converted to read on an Ipod Touch.
For some odd reason, The Girl Who Played With Fire is missing the final chapter (31) -- only realised when I finished chapter 30 and it obviously wasn't the end of the book.
